ModuleSummary:
Diabetes Mellitus or Diabetes as it is commonly known, is the inability of the body to effectively use or respond to the insulin produced by the body, and as a result, blood sugar levels cannot be regulated effectively.

In this topic of Diabetes Science we will look into the pathophysilogy, complications and the sick day management in diabetes.

ModuleSummary: Diabetes is a globally rising scrounge and its numbers are increasing exponentially in India. Diabetes management has many facets like diet exercise education and pharmacotherapy. In this section I shall be discussing nuances of monitoring, management and MNT. These all lead to better outcomes and better glycemic control. Hypoglycemia causes fear and anxiety among patients and knowledge of its management is an important facet of diabetes management.

ModuleName: Training on- Individualized MNT for Weight & Diabetes management
ModuleSummary:
Nutrition intervention is one of the three pillars of diabetes management.

As we all know, the principle of MNT for diabetes includes not only managing the blood sugars but also managing body weight, blood lipids and holistic management like prevention of macro and micro vascular complications.

In these modules various facets of nutritional management in diabetes are discussed like planning diets keeping in mind weight management or cardiovascular issues.

Also it will give you a broad perspective on what to keep in mind while planning with various therapeutic agents.Last but not the least counselling about these diets is where all the success of a diet plan lies and that will also be tackled in this module.
